Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Bed too big for room expensive breakfast no water placed in rooms especially during summer weather jacuzzi in bathroom is nothing special to pay extra for
Positive_Review: Location the spacious bathrooms

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Very cosy room As in very cosy even for luxury rooms
Positive_Review: Fantastic location Away from tourist places but all within reasonable walking distance Or 8euro Uber ride Comfortable bed Very quiet

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Not a good value for over 300 Euros a night Deluxe room 103 was too small wouldn t expect this in a real 4 star hotel Still manageable if we 2 adults with a 6 year old were allowed to sleep together on the one large bed But the hotel insisted to install in the room an extra bed for the modest 69 Euro per night We used it to put our suitcases on there was no other place left Also there was an unpleasant odor on the floor I d put this hotel more in the B B category I don t think as a whole it has the capacity for more
Positive_Review: Good location of the hotel and light in the room bathroom High ceilings

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: The bar fridge in the room was not cold but it was a minor issue and we never bothered to tell anyone
Positive_Review: Great location and very comfy bed Rooms are small but most rooms in Paris are Great value for money given the location

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Would have been nice to have access to an iron to press some clothes but other than that nothing
Positive_Review: Friendly staff helped out with everything including booking restaurant on first night taxis and airport transfers Really convenient location close to everything we wanted to see and do We booked again for the next time in Paris

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: We were charged twice for taking water from the room or from the breakfast area We never took any of the water I am not sure what was going on here The person cleaning the rooms should check the number of bottles in the refrigerator but I guess they saw a bottle of evian on our desk bought at a convenience store and decided to charge us The front desk removed the charges after asking us about it though so that was good Otherwise great location and good place to stay
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Nothing to complain about
Positive_Review: The hotel was very central to the river Stein and the louvre In a very chic area of Paris I would highly recommend hotel to my friends and family We would definitely stay again

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: the reception girls were too hectic one over smiling and stressed and the other one stressed and a litte irritable And they couldnt get me a taxi in 10 minutes I almost was delayed to a galla dinner they could only call one taxi company they said
Positive_Review: the place street close to university

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Room 501 has a balcony the hotel s only one perfect for a sunny morning or evening St Germain is a lovely part of Paris and the hotel staff were charming Thoroughly enjoyed our stay here and would come back again

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: The room was not spacious by any means but I did not expect a large space in an older urban hotel I loved that the room had a c because it was quite warm in Paris during our stay The staff was very friendly and made us feel welcome
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: TINY room and I mean TINY Barely enough space to step down from the bed NO space at all to keep suitcases open One of the reception ladies was beyond lovely and the other was kind of rude When checking out she was barking questions at me whilst taking a call to someone else even though we were being served by the other receptionist
Positive_Review: The location was well priced for this area Nicely styled hotel

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location was great the service impeccable and the room was both very Parisian while still having modern updated bathroom features I wish I could have stayed longer

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: The lack of a decent hairdryer for guests was a real surprise I had been travelling for 3 weeks and this was the ONLY establishment that did not provide a portable hair dryer Instead the dreadful old fashioned drying hose stuck to the bathroom wall was the ONLY option A staff member very kindly brought in her hair dryer for me to use during my 3 day stay So PLEASE TAKE NOTE purchase a couple or hairdryers for use by guests who request them it really is not good enough to only provide those ghastly old fashioned wall dryer any more
Positive_Review: Staff were very helpful and gave us helpful advice on all our Paris queries Restaurant suggestions also very good We were able to store luggage and change clothes ready for travelling at the end of our stay

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: I found a toenail on the floor when I checked in and the maid looked annoyed that I had asked for the floor to be cleaned again Considering the price you pay you expect it to be of a certain standard
Positive_Review: The bed was comfortable and room had a lot of light The location was perfect and easy to walk everywhere One lady from reception was helpful and very polite I would stay here again

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Was a bit expensive but couldn t fault anything else
Positive_Review: Hotel and room was beautiful Staff friendly and v helpful Location was perfect a beautiful area of Paris with lots of lovely cafes restaurants and shops

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: More storage room Wooden floor in bedroom Description of hotel implied that there was a pool bath Jacuzzi which there was not
Positive_Review: Comfortable bed Friendly helpful staff

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Would have preferred a top sheet to a douve should ve asked Adults with better parenting skills 6 7 year old kids running down the hall and slamming the door at 1am is bothersome Adults smoking out of windows against the rules Staff was always quick to address the issues before there was a chance to pickup the phone
Positive_Review: Elegant comfortable and welcoming Perfect location with engaging and friendly staff Room was quiet with a c shower separate tub and all the modern amenities Couldn t pick a better location Left out the front door of the hotel and you re straight down to the Louvre short walk Right out the front door and you re one block to the best cafes and shopping in Paris Staff deserves a special mention Truly multilingual very knowledgeable and prepared for anything

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Reception staff were both professional and friendly making it very warm and homey We visited the hotel twice during our stay in France and I would recommend it to anyone wanted a wonderful boutique hotel in the Saint Germain area of Paris

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Inevitably given its location there is a certain amount of traffic noise
Positive_Review: The staff were exceptionally helpful and friendly and although we didn t need it we observed that they were able to converse in a good range of languages The Express breakfast at 12 euros was extremely good value the freshly squeezed orange juice was absolutely delicious and also commended by other guests

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Breakfast overpriced for what was served outside room 203 step not properly marked fell bruised knee ankle shoulder Witnessed an d reported to hotel staff
Positive_Review: Charming an D friendly

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Perhaps could have more tea and milk in the room
Positive_Review: The room was clean and comfortable The bathroom was also clean The hotel has a lovely ambience and the staff are extremely welcoming and very helpful

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Towels were a bit small Everything else was excellent
Positive_Review: Crisp White bed linen comfy firm mattresses our room was very quiet Decor was fresh and modern Reception staff were very friendly

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Irene at the reception desk is the friendiest clerk in the city She was welcoming helpful and understood what we needed after an overnight flight She is the best and we will come back Thank you

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Very happy with all amenities
Positive_Review: Staff were extremely friendly and helpful and even got to know our names This upmarket location of the hotel is central walking distance to all we needed including many amazing restaurants

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Some problem with order via booking We choose 2 different beds but when we arrived we saw 1 big bed But after one night our room number was changed two beds and we be happy
Positive_Review: Best breakfast uau Very reach fresh orange juice coffee croissants eggs cheese etc Best place walking via Loure Musee Orsay boulevard Saint Germain Best cafe near hotel Toscano Italian and Coffee point on the University street near Saint Peres On Saint Germain a lot of to see walking you can go to the Old University Sorbonne

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Very small room 205 Nowhere to hang a coat No more negatives
Positive_Review: Comfortable bed good linen Great shower Very clean Great staff extremely helpful and friendly Good breakfast Good location five min walk to the Louvre Beautifully decorated in a modern but quite traditional manner much nicer than bland contemporary decor This is Paris after all Would be happy to stay here again

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Difficult to find some room in the bathroom but that s it on the negative side really
Positive_Review: Hotel recently refurbished nicely decorated Staff very helpful and friendly

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Nothing everything was just perfect
Positive_Review: I loved this hotel the staff were amazingly helpful and friendly the location was excellent the bars and restaurants were wonderful and good value This was my best stay in Paris so far highly recommended

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Room is very tight Breakfast too expensive Well positioned though not in the heart of the main tourist sector
Positive_Review: Very friendly staff Neat clean hotel Big comfortable bed

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We only stayed one night but it was lovely Very friendly staff incredible location and is much better than some of the 4 hotels I ve stayed in I would highly recommend it and I look forward to coming back soon

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The rooms were lovely meticulously maintained sparkling clean The staff were friendly and made every effort to see we were happy Made our stay comfortable and made us feel welcome in Saint Germain Close to everything

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: The rooms are pretty small and some of the furniture are miniscule e g bedside table doesn t fit much
Positive_Review: Clean with a lot of character Friendly and very accommodating staff Perfect location Highly recommended We will visit again

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Dirty bathroom had to call the reception and night manager was rude as I was going to have diner requested my magnetic door card with attitude
Positive_Review: Day time reception were really welcoming and solved issues effectiveness and the bed was really comfortable

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No love no champagne on New Year s Eve Small room Can hear guests next door
Positive_Review: Location though no views Friendly staff though feeling treated a bit like kids Jacuzzi though small and uncomfortable

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Optional breakfast should be avoided due to radio playing annoying commercials and unsuitable music for breakfast but this is no problem because there is a good boulangerie just around the corner
Positive_Review: Very nice hotel in St Germain Close to great bistros museums Seine river etc etc Friendly welcoming staff

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I honestly love this hotel very much friendly staffs great location nice and cute bedroom with awesome facilities I would definitely recommend to my friends and for sure I ll re book this hotel

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: A sink in the room was partially blocked
Positive_Review: Location of the hotel is great close to the city centre In a close proximity there is a number of good restaurants Metro subway station is 5 minutes walk from the hotel

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Rooms ridiculously small almost impossible to get into the shower and breakfast much too expensive for very mediocre quality
Positive_Review: Location and style of decor

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: very very small rooms please watch your head when you get up from the toilet over priced but you only pay for location
Positive_Review: Good location clean hotel nice stuff very close to cafes and bars and the Market Shops

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great location great and friendly Staff 3 stars but feels at least like 4 Price vs standard comparing to other Parisian hotels is outstanding We enjoyed our stay nice rooms perfeclty clean and neat Nice bathroom Bar with rooms service and food Hotel offered us good priced shuttle services etc Will definately come back

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location was great just off a busy street with lots to do around including the Latin Quarter and the great metro system The room was pretty well insulated though we could hear the couple in the adjoining room Most of the staff was friendly and energetic

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Room was compact fine for sleeping but not for hanging around in fairness you shouldn t be hanging around in a hotel room in the city of paris
Positive_Review: location was central staff were very friendly safety concious

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: The drawers in the side table were not cleaned out well I found a food wrapper and brochures in one of them The shuttle service partner used by the hotel He fell asleep multiple times while driving a van full of 6 tourists to the airport We could see him dozing off from the rear view mirror Horrifying Take the RER or a taxi
Positive_Review: I got upgraded Front desk guy was very polite sincere and helpful Bathroom was a good size and very clean Bathroom had a jacuzzi tub Room felt very cosy Bed was very comfortable Peaceful and quiet

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Only demerit was the tiny little bars of soap
Positive_Review: The staff was fantastic Patricia and Irene were upbeat and so helpful with so many details of our five day visit to Paris This was a gem for the price

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: When we got back to our room about 3pm after being out all day our room had not been cleaned About an hour later they called and asked if we wanted room service I just asked for fresh towels which were delivered right away No big deal
Positive_Review: Early check in was no problem Desk staff were friendly and spoke excellent english Irene was especially helpful with a hand drawn map of the area They arranged an airport shuttle for our early morning flight

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Breakfast was not included but I ate out with friends for breakfast anyway
Positive_Review: The room was gorgeous clean comfortable and very charming The location was fantastic

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: My husband and I stayed for a week at the end of September We loved the Hotel the staff and the location The Hotel was very well appointed very comfortable and very clean Our room was a generous size with a large TV and the bathroom was lovely We loved the bed linens quite luxurious after a day of wandering The best quality of this hotel is their staff everyone was very friendly helpful and simply couldn t do enough for us We highly recommend and would definitely stay with Hotel Academie on our next trip to Paris Thank you Hotel Academie

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: The room was really tiny compared to similar hotels it was a little expensive for the size of room But it was immaculate in cleanliness and freshness of decor etc
Positive_Review: The location was excellent near to Boulevard St Germain some nearby restaurants and food shops Also could walk to the river and transport

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The Hotel was really nice small but functional it was very close to the centre of St Germain s and close to lots of restaurants the bedroom was very comfortable and I would go back

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: I cant think of anything that wasnt perfect
Positive_Review: My daughter and I were visiting Paris for two days on the way to Greece and found this boutique hotel on booking com It was very french very beautiful and charming close to everything for walking The rooms couldnt have been nicer The bathroom was luxurious and stylish and bed was big and comfortable There was a lovely breakfast room with a full buffet or the choice of just pastry and coffee which was perfect for starting a long day of touring We loved the location near the metro St Germain and many good restaurants and museums The hotel lobby clerk arranged for a van ride to Charles De Gualle that was very reasonable and on time which made our travel so much easier an relaxing All in all a perfect place to stay for a visit to Paris

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: I didn t like the manner the manager from the lobby spoke to me when I informed her about dirty sheet She said It is just impossible I said that unfortunately it is possible and showed her the picture I made She said No it is just wet But it wasn t wet it was just dirty I don t like the idea when the manager doesn t believe me and I need to spend my time trying to prove that there is a mistake Finally she believed my words and apologized for this But I was dissatisfied as the whole dialog was unacceptable
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel is great I liked the design of the hotel and its rooms

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Bedbugs contamination and failure to proceed to agreed refund Contamination punaises de lit et refus de proc der au remboursement promis Unfortunately I was bitten by bedbugs during my 2 night stay at Hotel Academie at the end of August 2016 I was able to prove it having found insects and cocoons in the bed in the morning The receptionist agreed to a full refund for my first night stay giving me a refund receipt and indicating that a bank transfer would be formalised when her manager gets back after my departure Hotel Academie recently sent me an email informing me that they refuse to implement the refund They argue that I have implicitly rejected this proposal when I agreed to stay at the Hotel though in another room which I had previously inspected and which did not appear to be contaminated for the second night of my pre paid reservation Not only was the room I slept in the first night infected Luxury room with spa but I am being denied a refund which was agreed to and put down in writing in exchange for the inconvenience This is very bad practice and service I therefore find it important to inform future customers J esp re sinc rement que les chambres contamin es seront trait es par des professionnels et que les autres clients affect s par la situation recevront un traitement juste et appropri dans les circonstances
Positive_Review: Well located renovated

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Clearer descriptions about breakfast options would have been good We thought we chose the continental breakfast only to find out the hot breakfast option was the only one that included the cheese and cold cuts of meat After choosing the cheese and cold meat we were charged the hot full breakfast although we didn t select any of the hot food Also our tea or coffee wasn t replenished through each day s cleaning With only 2 satchels each of the coffee and tea at the start of our stay these were not adequate for our 4 night stay
Positive_Review: Boutique styled hotel It is close to Louvre restaurants and the hop on hop bus stop and easy to walk to the many nearby food outlets The rooms and storage space is very small the room suited our needs over our stay and were very clean

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Building outside was a tad loud in the morning but out of the hotels control
Positive_Review: Beautiful hotel great location nicely furnished Lovely Italian receptionist I forget her name sorry super happy person She was extremely bubbly and very helpful

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: The only negative being you could hear noise from the next room
Positive_Review: Location was excellent whilst also being in a quiet street but near both the louvre and Notre Dame Staff especially Patricia were very helpful Interconnecting room was a bonus and the rooms a good size Both rooms were immaculate

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Spa bath is not even big enough for one person so rather don t advertise that there is one
Positive_Review: Bed was really comfy Location was great walking distance to river shops and restaurants

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This is a charming little boutique hotel in the heart of Paris The rooms were wonderfully decorated and spotless The reception staff was always welcoming you with a smile and willing to help you with any request

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: The wifi connection wasn t very good as we were on the second floor
Positive_Review: Welcoming friendly and helpful staff Beautiful rooms Great location within walking distance of local attractions

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This was the most romantic hotel we stayed in out of about 8 hotels during our honeymoon The room had modern fixtures and felt very clean with gorgeous French personality We arrived very early in the morning and as such had requested an early check in but didn t expect it would be possible we were very pleasantly surprised to find the staff had gone out of their way to make this happen Lovely to relax in such a splendid room after an overnight flight The location is also fantastic Merci beaucoup

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Everything was great
Positive_Review: Great breakfast The staff was really helpful and very friendly The room was very comfortable and the bathroom was modern We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely go back

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Nothing wrong with our stay but they will need to keep tip top maintenance of the white decor
Positive_Review: Small rooms but we ll designed Luxury fittings in the bathroom and very good shower Bed comfortable Everything you need for a short stay Tea and coffee making facilities in the room a good touch wi fi easy to connect and strong Public areas very tastefully decorated A nice location in St germaine

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: You could do without the disinfectant process after showering Very annoying esp after midnight doubtful effect
Positive_Review: We had an awesome experience First rate staff clean rooms beautiful Saint Germain ambience

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: The room and closet space was extremely limited even for the content of 2 carry ons
Positive_Review: The breakfast was excellent The quiet and sunny corner of the hotel location is a plus and the staff goes out of their way in their kindness

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Nothing to report
Positive_Review: Wonderful boutique hotel in Saint Germain Paris Location best ever Walking distance to top attractions as well as many less known ones Staff always went out of their way to help you Just the little things like remembering your name every time nothing too difficult Always greeted with a smile by ALL staff Ambience of hotel made you feel relaxed an welcome from the moment you stepped in the door Felt very safe in location during current high terrorist alert Will definitely stay there again next visit to Paris Highly recommended

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Staff were amazing very friendly and helpful Our room was beautiful modern and very clean Will be staying when we visit Paris again Lovely area with lots of shops and cafes

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Honestly nothing I really would like to offer ideas for improvement but the hotel was perfect for us Our room was not large but we didn t expect it to be Room size was not important to us
Positive_Review: The entire front desk staff was very warm and friendly They made us feel welcome from the moment we walked in after a long overnight flight and one of us hates to fly They really went out of their way to treat us well the entire stay The hotel itself was very clean and nicely decorated and the location could not have been better It s right in the heart of St Germaine but also on a quiet street We walked everywhere we wanted to go

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: We like everything about our stay
Positive_Review: The Staff Extremely positive helpful interactive just delightful The hotel is in a perfect location to walk to Paris attractions and is situated near fantastic restaurants The hotel is exceptionally clean

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Man at reception on weekend made offensive accusations about my credit card and barked threateningly and delayed my departure unreasonably when the hotel s malfunctioning credit card scanner was to blame My card was immediately accepted when the number was entered manually His behavior was unacceptable Also the room s heat source is oddly located inside the closet It wasn t a significant issue in late spring other than potentially dangerously overheating a GoreTex jacket There was a small hole in the duvet cover Reception did not warn me when I arrived that the room safe had been removed for repair
Positive_Review: Location is excellent Nicely renovated room was small but reasonably comfortable for one Most staff were friendly courteous and efficient

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: The very noisy spa baths self cleaning And the adjoining room could hear snoring sneezing tv and talking
Positive_Review: The opulence and location and the helpfulness of the staff Very comfy beds

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Wish there was space to sit and read in the room Well designed but tight quarters
Positive_Review: Location convenient to Musee dOrsay Notre Dame Batobus yet on quiet street Great bakery and excellent restaurant Le Perron just steps away Hotel was newly renovated and offered modern amenities Irene and Patrice at the front desk were welcoming and most helpful

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: The rooms are ridiculously small There is little space beside the bed The price is too high for the space provided
Positive_Review: Great location very friendly staff

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Noise travels between rooms where there are adjoining doors
Positive_Review: This small recently modernised and charming little hotel is right in the heart of Paris only 50 metres from Boulevard St Germain Many of the main sights of the city can be easily walked to It is surrounded by good restaurants and the famous Cafe Deux Magots Cafe Flore and Cafe Procope are all within a 5 minute walk While the rooms are small they are well appointed and comfortable and all bathrooms have apparently only recently been refitted and tiled The reception staff are effervescent to put it mildly and very helpful If the price of breakfast at the hotel seems steep as it did to us there are many alternatives nearby for a coffee and croissant Some rooms like ours 101 have doors to adjoining rooms that apparently can be opened up to make a 2 room suite and the doors between block little sound Our neighbour sometimes sounded as though he was in OUR room Avoid these rooms if possible Notwithstanding this small issue we would not hesitate to stay at this hotel again

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Room was small by U S standards but normal for European standards That is only reason I did not give highest rating for comfort
Positive_Review: Great location Approx 3 blocks from river and Luvee Museum Although museum was closed during our stay because of high water level in river Lots of restaurants and shops near by Staff was extra friendly and helpful for an older couple 76 71 who did not speak French Bathroom fixtures were modern Spa tub wonderful after full day of sightseeing Breakfast was good and priced reasonable Mattress was comfortable

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: The bed was quite hard but that is to be expected in Europe The bathtub had an auto clean feature that startled me the first time it came on it was temperamental and came on mid shower not a big deal but I could have used a warning
Positive_Review: Staff were super friendly and spoke excellent English They make you turn your key card in every time you go out which I thought I might be a bit of a hassle but I ended up really liking it because it was nice being personally greeted each time I came in Room service was great and very accommodating

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: We were there for 3 nights which I booked 2 months in advance which was a big mistake While we were there I checked online and I could have got my first night for nearly half the price I paid and on the other 2 nights they were priced 30 cheaper than we paid Not at all happy about that The bedrooms are very small and too be honest we got more space on a basic cabin on a cruise ship we travelled on recently
Positive_Review: Staff were very helpful and friendly

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Room was small but this is pretty common for Paris so it was in line with my expectations
Positive_Review: Great bed and beautiful room Good internet Continental breakfast was a good value especially compared to what was available in the area as alternatives

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: The hallway was kinda narrow which I was ok with It s an old building in Paris except the carpet smell and Mr Rude George Security Guy awful attitude and behavior for I don t know what reason Big turn off I wont be back to that property because of him What a nightmare
Positive_Review: The room was clean the sheets were crisp and the bed was comfortable The hotel has been remodeled recently so the room looks and feels basically new The front desk Patricia has a great personality very helpful a huge plus for this hotel

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Standard room is small but typical for Paris and Europe in general
Positive_Review: English speaking and friendly staff and helpful with directions and restaurant recommendations Latin Quarter is walking distance for some sightseeing Metra is close for the airport and Versailles

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff booked a shuttle for me which had to be canceled I paid in full and they insisted that I did not telling me that they would review the films that they took of me at the front desk All of this in front of another guest It was horrible customer service insulting and humiliating and I would not recommend this hotel for the price you have to pay

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: I like crispy bacon and the bacon was too undercooked for me Everything else was very good
Positive_Review: Staff was so friendly and helpful Hotel is beautiful Our room was pretty comfortable and larger than expected

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Nothing to unlike about the hotel staff only 1 flaw was being took back to CDG for our flight to early we had to hang around for 4 hours before our flight as the couples we were traveling to the airport with had flights at 14 30 it would have been a more personal touch to be taken to the airport 2 hours later than we left all to accommodate other passengers
Positive_Review: Fantastic layout in Napolionic style decor the staff were more than helpful

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Missing tea service in the room and would have liked breakfast included in the rate
Positive_Review: Loved the decor and the location right near everything 10 minute walk to the musee D orsay and 15 minutes to the Louvre Helpful staff

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Washbasin area was rather cramped and we assumed the spa didn t work on the first night as we were told to press the button The next evening the receptionist clarified that it needed to be stroked and then it worked
Positive_Review: We liked the room with its exposed beams and the bed was very comfortable We liked the fact that we could open the bedroom window for fresh air

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This hotel was super clean and efficient I d like to have had coffee making facilities in the room or downstairs free of charge considering the room rate I think breakfast should be in the room rate then encouraging guests to use the ground floor facilities in the foyer etc a little more I wasn t quite sure if the bar downstairs was for guests to use or not It would have been nice for this to be a little more enticing to sit at the end of a night out or have a drink before going out All in all location room staff were very good

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Well we have to pay by checking in is that true
Positive_Review: One of the reception is super nice she is definitely an additional nice impression of Paris for us And other personal are also really comfortable to talk with Thank you

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Noisy rain dropping outside Breakfast hours unsuitable for business travelers Though I was curious to see what a 19 breakfast would look like
Positive_Review: Very good location Friendly staff Splendid renovation relooking of the rooms

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No real complaints
Positive_Review: Staff were exceptionally helpful particularly Irene Location is perfect for a short stay in Paris and is within walking distance to many of the top sites Room was great but the temperature was a little difficult to control

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: everything from the rooms to the very friendly and very welcoming staff at the front desk Nothing was too much for them Irene and Anna were wonderful explaining everything both in English and French but mostly their smile and cheerful faces made us feel at home The rooms were very comfortable warm and airy and extremely clean The location was very central to everything we wanted to see and the hotel was classic Thank you all

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No tea making facilities but maybe that s me being too British
Positive_Review: Fantastic greeting and reception staff always really warm and helpful best staff we ve ever encountered at a hotel Walking distance to museums notre dame great places to eat etc Fantastic spa bath which made us a lot less tired than usual when sight seeing in a city Great Express breakfast half price of main breakfast and served in room so very relaxed start to day Spotlessly clean Comfortable beds

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: There was nothing to dislike
Positive_Review: Apart from the perfect location the room we stayed in was very charming and very comfortable and it had a balcony The bathtub with air bubbles was also a plus

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: The room could have had coffee tea making facilities
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly The hotel was very comfortable The facilities were nice The location was excellent

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: The room was quite small
Positive_Review: Location was great in the middle of Saint Germain And really friendly staff as well The room was clean and they took security quite seriously by asking for the hotel keys each time you leave the hotel

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No facilities such as coffee machine or kettle Wifi was a little weak
Positive_Review: Got a nice upgrade to the junior suite Large spacious rooms Can t say enough how wonderful the staff at reception is especially one lady who was just a joy to talk to but unfortunately didn t catch her name

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Nothing at all the room was quite small but that wasn t a problem for us
Positive_Review: Friendly staff nicely decorated well appointed and comfortable room The location was great many of Paris famous attractions were within walking distance

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: The double bed had had 2 mattresses pushed together comfy but a gap in the middle Bit of shame but still a lovely room hilarious bath Well done guys
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Nothing bad to say You could hear the neighbours a bit but it was not disturbing
Positive_Review: The hotel is supernice and as beuatiful as you imagine a parisian hotel Staff is very helpful and kind Location is perfect it s in a pretty little area With lots of cafes and restaurants Next time when in Paris i definately stay here again Christine

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Accommodation had some noise intrusion from neighbouring room The rooms are described as soundproof but fell short in that respect A shame as score would be a 10 otherwise
Positive_Review: Design ambiance and pleasant cheerful staff Decor fresh in rooms and elegant furnishings in lobby Super location Compact but well designed bathroom

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Interior sound proofing low quality I could very easily hear people from other rooms Box office TV channels low options
Positive_Review: Hotel close to main visiting attractions Personnel very kind Exterior sound proofing is good quality

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Good classic breakfast but we are into super healthy food so was a bit limited for us and too expensive
Positive_Review: Front Desk staff and porter very welcoming and helpful Felt very looked after

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Can t think of anything
Positive_Review: Staff was very friendly and treated us very well They offered great information spoke very good English and made sure we were happy We had no French lessons before arriving and they were kind regarding our lack of knowledge They suggested great places to eat and visit for entertainment The location is in walking distance to Metro Louvre Musee D Orsay If you walk down St Germaine to the left about 4 5 blocks there is a plethora of great places to eat drink and take in the lifestyle

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: very attentive and helpful staff excellent room with a superb bathroom A perfect location for lots of good resturants and shops We would definatly return

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: The bed was a little hard
Positive_Review: Super clean and nice bathroom also a very nice and spacious room 201 The guy that drove our car to the parking and back was super

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Poor Wifi connection It was possible to hear from room on the side since there was only a separation door
Positive_Review: The hotel is in an absolutely excellent location near shops restaurants cafes and underground station The room was cosy and nicely furnitured with comfortable bed and double windows which could isolate well from sounds from the street Bathroom with jacuzzi Everything impeccably clean

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Shower was horrible water stopped and started and the self cleaning system was horrible if you had a shower shortly after your partner the cold air would blow cold water up from the floor halfway through the second shower and if the hot water stopped you were standing there freezing
Positive_Review: great location get a weekend metro pass and don t be afraid to use it Handy to the Louvre were upgraded to nicer room Staff were friendly and very helpful

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Not too sure whether the hotel actually has aircon We were moved out of our first room because it was boiling hot and no air was coming in via the aircon vent The second room was somewhat better but mainly because we then just opened the windows and tried to ignore the traffic noise Rooms smallish Bath size for tiny people
Positive_Review: location fantastic

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent hotel great location in St Germain Just renovated in louis XVI style beautiful The staff welcomed us and are very good we received an upgrade on arrival to a Junior Suite from Patricia the Manageress she was great and also Sien very good excellent service Merci Thank you so much for a wonderfull weekend break in Paris Definitely recommend this hotel and we will use again Merci John Kathryn Doyle Australia

Hotel_Name: Acad mie H tel Saint Germain
